DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Study Exercise Rehabilitation Pain Disability Patients With Non-specific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study measure change lumbopelvic hip mechanic treatment group follow completion exercise program . We hypothesize difference observe group follow 6wk rehabilitation program , group complete combine local ( segmental ) stabilizer hip stabilizer strengthen program ( T2 ) demonstrate significant difference mechanic compare baseline testing .
DOC.criteria: 1865 year old Unilateral bilateral NSLBP symptom minimum 6 week Current symptom rat least 5/10 scale 010 Symptoms 'red flag ' underlie pathological condition bowel and/or bladder problem , radicular symptom , night pain Scoliosis Neurological impairment , discogenic pathology , vestibular disorder Pregnancy within 1 year give birth Previous ongoing complication low extremity injury surgery past year Previous surgery lumbar spine hip Use radiological intervention injection prolotherapy , corticosteroid , nerve block past 3 month
